name: Nokware neem face cleanser
description: A gentle exfoliating face cleanser made with Willow bark extract, Hempseed oil and Neem oil to remove impurities and excess oils whiles reducing acne and treating hyperpigmentation. With added glycerin and hyaluronic acid to hydrate the skin whiles exfoliating.

name: Dang ageless foaming face wash
description: DANG! Ageless everyday gentle foaming face wash is a high quality face wash that thoroughly cleanses the skin repairs, smoothens and rejuvenates the skin for a healthier looking complexion. SLS Free.

name: Dang mandelic acid face wash
description: DANG! Ageless Mandelic 3-in-1 Face Wash (30ml) is a genuine foaming cleanser that banishes grimes while gently exfoliating deep down to the skin pores. Its cleaning enhances your complexion and leaves your skin smooth and soft. Squeeze a pea-sized amount of Mandelic 3-in-1 Face Wash in your palm. Gently massage your face for effective exfoliation. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry. Follow up with treatment and Moisturizer. During the day, finish with sunscreen. Mandelic 3-in-1 Face wash is brown colored due to raw honey mixed with mandelic acid. Ensure to shake slightly before use.

name: Arami vanilla scented glow oil
description: In collaboration with Skin Science Africa, Glow Oil Vanilla Spice is a rich & smooth rendition of our bestselling multi-purpose oil. The creamy Vanilla Spice scent is Far From Ordinary, leaving you with feelings of peace & calm, whilst lifting your mood in a comforting way. Use as a daily moisturiser on your skin & to seal the ends of your hair, locking moisture into every aspect of your body.

name: Dang snail serum
description: The same way snails regenerate their own shell, our snail mucin repair serum will reinforce skin regeneration, reduce acne scars, moisturise dry skin, soothe damaged skin and give you an instant glow. With the help of tranexamic acid, it helps reduce hyperpigmentation. It contains Snail Secretion Filtrate, Tranexamic Acid, Aloe Vera. The multi function snail mucin repair serum takes what nature has given us and turns it into a safe formulation which not only protects your skin but keeps it healthy and glowing. Formulated in South Korea by board certified dermatologists, this serum contains minerals, antioxidants, growth factors amongst other ingredients great for improving wrinkles and skin texture, hydrating the skin and strengthening damaged skin barriers. Not to mention it works well with actives and layers nicely into your routine. Also stimulates collagen production giving you a plump, firm, elastic, youthful skin!.
